comment: Very cool guy, talks alot but Very easy class, only had to turn in essay's at the end of the semester. Quizzes were easy because you only had to get 4 ou of 10 right to get a 100. Take him if you want an A
He is a great teacher. If you dont mind a teacher that gets off track then he is great. If you need an easier english class, this is the guy!

Nice Guy.  Easy Class.  ...The class was really elementary (I had him for English Composition 2), but I don't think you can blame him.  As long as you can write a well formed sentence (oh wait--88% of the people at this school can't), you'll make an A for sure. --but that's not him, that's any Engineering School's Literature Course...
He is a great teacher, very helpful and energetic.

Awesome teacher, very helpful. You have to write a lot of essays but he lets u turn them in any time throughout the simester as long as you have them in the end. He's willing to meet with you out of class any time, just schedule it with him. 4 or 5 quizzes that were 10 or 12 questions but u only had to get 4 right to make a 100. No test just essays
Super nice professor. Helps a lot and tries to make the class interesting. He only ask for attendance!!. I would take it again!!!
Good classes. English comp 1 & 2 was not overbearing, yet motivating.  Work load was not bad.  Highly recommend.
the best proffesor I have ever had. Very understanding, helpful, nice, ... just great
he is a very good professor. he is tough on grading but once you get to know what he is looking for you will do good. i would recommend him to everyone.

very good prof. helped me out with assignments and let me turn them in late without penalty. i dont know if that his policy but he did it for me. kept the class interesting and nothing about it was to hard.. i would def recomend him to anyone.
